item.title: META
item.description: score:-31 Chances: Meta Platforms, formerly known as Facebook, is a prominent tech company in the social media industry. Meta’s new microblogging platform, Threads, gained more than 100 million sign-ups. Highlighted as a top-rated AI stock to watch in the technology sector. Risks: Public conflict and ongoing feud between Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg and Tesla CEO Elon Musk.
